sentences.en: An honorable contest of arms becomes a mockery.
sentences.cn: 一场光荣的真刀真枪的较量,变成了一场嘲弄的事情.

sentences.en: For a dozen years his service had been honorable and efficient.
sentences.cn: 十多年来,他的经营效率又高,又有信誉.

sentences.en: He argued that the only honorable course of action was death.
sentences.cn: 他认为唯一体面的行为就只有一死。

sentences.en: He was given an honorable burial.
He was honorable in word and in deed.
His aim is honorable and praiseworthy.
sentences.cn: 他的目的是高尚的,值得称赞的.

sentences.en: Honorable Sir, I have an aged mother to support.
sentences.cn: 大恩大德的老爷, 我上有老母要孝敬.

sentences.en: I don't think I am worthy of such an honorable title.
sentences.cn: 这样的光荣称号，我可担当不起。

sentences.en: Not all men are as honorable or hold to the same standards as Sam.
sentences.cn: 不是所有的人都像萨姆那样品德如此高尚，抑或恪守同样的道德准则。

sentences.en: Should he be styled " Right Honorable " or " Mister "?
sentences.cn: 应该称他为 " 阁下 " 还是 " 先生 "?

sentences.en: The offender is extruded as unworthy of an honorable calling.
sentences.cn: 违者将以不配从事光荣职业而被除名.

sentences.en: These businessmen are both competitive and honorable.
sentences.cn: 这些商人既有竞争性又很诚实。

sentences.en: They should see themselves as aliens,as exiles, and yet they should see themselves as properly subservient,honorable, well behaved exiles in a Roman context.
sentences.cn: 他们应该把自己当做入境者，寄居者，并应该把自己看做是,适当屈从的和可敬的，行为良好的在罗马的寄居者。

sentences.en: We would blunt the offensive and conclude the war on honorable terms.
sentences.cn: 我们将挫败这个攻势,而按体面的条件结束战争.

sentences.en: You are so fine, so honorable and he --'she broke off, confused.
sentences.cn: 你这么文雅, 这么正直,而瑞德 ---- " 她停下来, 不知道怎么说好.

words.tran_cn: 受尊敬的；已承兑或付款的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 优秀奖；鼓励奖；荣誉奖
